passive_1: Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 25% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 20 bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 20% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 15 bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 20% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 15 – 30 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.

Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 15% – 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 15 – 30 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.
motd: Bugfix: Sanctify's effects on the user now properly scale with the affected ally's level and not their level.

passive_1: Healing and shielding an ally enhances you and affected allies with 10% – 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 – 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: Passive no longer activates with self shields.
Undocumented: Now also triggers from casting shields on yourself.

passive_1: Your heals and shields on allied champions grant you both 10% – 30% (based on target's level) attack speed, and 5 – 20 (based on target's level) on-hit magic damage.
Your heals and shields on allied champions grant you both 20% – 35% (based on target's level) attack speed, and 20 – 35 (based on target's level) on-hit magic damage.
Your heals and shields on allied champions grant them 25% attack speed, and 25 on-hit magic damage and healing for 6 seconds.
Your heals and shields on allied champions grant them 20% – 35% (based on target's level) attack speed, and 20 – 35 (based on target's level) on-hit magic damage and healing for 6 seconds.
Your heals and shields on allied champions grant them 20% attack speed, and +20 on-hit magic damage and healing for 6 seconds.
Your heals and shields on allied champions grant them 15% attack speed and +30 on-hit magic damage for 6 seconds.
motd: Note: Patch notes claim that attack speed was reduced from 30%.

passive_1: Your heals and shields on another unit grant them 25% attack speed for 6 seconds.
